text_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $3x - 7$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $2x + 8$ units.
The quadrilateral $ABCD$ is an isosceles quadrilateral.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $3x - 7$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $2x + 8$ units.

diagram_logic_form: The point $P$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $D$.
The point $P$ also lies on the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
line_instances: There are lines $AC$, $AD$, $AP$, $BA$, $BC$, $BD$, $BP$, $CD$, $CP$, and $DP$ forming the trapezoid and its diagonals.
